customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Negative from: filter
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post a message with a unique word (ex. foobarbaz)
  2. Search for the unique word and with a filter of "from:POST_USER" (POST_USER should be the user that submitted the post in step 1).
  3. Search for the unique word with a negative filter of "-from:POST_USER" (POST_USER should be the user that submitted the post in step 1).
inline.expectedResult:
• On step 2, search results that include the post with your unique word.
  • On step 3, search results should not include your new post.

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• (Story) Negative search filters can lead to incorrect highlighting of search results — MM-19487
  • Search: Exclude results containing specific words — MM-11359
  • Desktop: Unread count changes after opening quick switcher —MM-15918
